creator: Aumio
descriptionHtml:
Insomnia and restless nights are a thing of the past! Discover our comprehensive app designed to optimize baby's sleep and help you find the precious rest you and your baby deserve.

Our sleep tracker accurately captures your baby's sleep patterns to give you insights into their sleep habits. You'll get detailed statistics and charts to help you identify patterns and determine the best time to go to bed. Say goodbye to irregular sleep routines and improve your baby's sleep for good.

Sleep aids are an essential part of our offering. From soothing melodies to gentle sounds of nature to rhythmic noise, we offer a variety of options to help your baby relax and drift off to sleep. Personalize the sounds according to your baby's preferences and create a peaceful atmosphere for a deeper and more restful night.

But our app offers more than just tracking and sleep aids. Our extensive collection of Baby Sleep Education content provides you with valuable information and advice to deepen your understanding of baby sleep. From sleep stages to sleep training techniques to proven bedtime rituals, our expert tips and articles will help you better understand your baby's sleep habits and create optimal conditions for healthy sleep.

With our user-friendly interface and intuitive design, using the app is a breeze. Track your baby's sleep in real time, get personalized recommendations and useful insights for better sleep quality.

Give yourself and your baby the rest you need and deserve. Download our app now and start improving baby's sleep today for relaxed nights and happy days!


- CONTACT -

You have something you want to tell us? Or you need some help? Then we would be very happy if you sent us an e-mail to baby@aumio.de. We look forward to hearing from you!

P.S.: If your family likes the journey through the inner cosmos, please rate us here in the store.


- CONDITIONS -

In order for us to continuously operate and improve our space offerings, you can support us with a subscription. In addition to the free content, subscriptions give you access to exclusive premium content.

Subscriptions renew automatically unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period. Your iTunes account will be charged for the next subscription term within 24 hours before the current subscription expires. The current in-app subscription term cannot be canceled. However, you can disable the auto-renew feature at any time through iTunes account settings.

And last but not least, even space is not a lawless place: Please find our detailed terms and conditions and privacy policy here:
- Terms & Conditions: https://aumio.de/app-agb/
- Privacy Policy: https://aumio.de/en/app-privacy-policy/
descriptionShort: Your companion for restful baby sleep: sleep tracker, sleep aids & more

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Excited about the update of our baby app? This update includes:

A complete re-design of our new baby app. With improved baby tracker to not only get detailed insights into your baby’s sleep rhythm but even predict and plan nap times.

Mixed with other new experiences, a new charming design, and a few important bug fixes!

If you get stuck somewhere, please write to us at info@aumio.de. We look forward to your feedback.

title:
Happy Baby: Sleep & Tracker
2.8.4

creator: Aumio
descriptionHtml:
Restless nights and mom-brain are a thing of the past!

Discover the Happy Baby app – designed to help your baby sleep better and support you in gaining confidence with your new routines.

Based on your baby's natural rhythm, our DreamTimer creates a daily nap and sleep schedule personalized to your baby's needs. You'll always know how to plan your day and when to put your little one down – before they get overtired. Say goodbye to irregular sleep routines and improve your baby's sleep for good.

Track everything from sleep, feeding, and diapers to solids and doctor visits. You can create your own custom routine and gain valuable insights into your baby's development and changing habits. All your log entries are saved forever, and our customized insights and diagrams help you understand what's best for your little one.

On top of that, you'll find plenty of sleep aids within our app. From soothing melodies and gentle nature sounds to rhythmic noise, we offer a variety of science-based sound experiences designed to help your baby relax and drift off to sleep. Personalize the sounds according to your baby's preferences to create a peaceful atmosphere for deeper, more restful nights.

In addition to helping your baby sleep better and supporting you in finding the right routine for your family, Happy Baby also offers an extensive knowledge articles on baby health and development. Is your baby going through a developmental leap or experiencing a sleep regression? Our timeline-based library will help you understand what your baby is going through and how you can best support them.

With our user-friendly interface and intuitive design, using the app is a breeze. Track your baby's sleep in real time, get personalized sleep plan recommendations, and find useful insights for raising a healthy and happy baby.

Give yourself and your baby the rest you both need and deserve. Download our app now and start improving your baby's sleep today for relaxed nights and happy days!

- CONTACT -

You have something you want to tell us? Or you need some help? Then we would be very happy if you sent us an e-mail to baby@aumio.de. We look forward to hearing from you!

P.S.: If you like using Happy Baby, please rate us here in the store.

- CONDITIONS -

In order for us to continuously operate and improve our space offerings, you can support us with a subscription. In addition to the free content, subscriptions give you access to exclusive premium content, extensive tracking functionality plus our loved DreamTimer which will always let you know about ideal nap times for your little one.

Subscriptions renew automatically unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period. Your iTunes account will be charged for the next subscription term within 24 hours before the current subscription expires. The current in-app subscription term cannot be canceled. However, you can disable the auto-renew feature at any time through iTunes account settings.

And last but not least, please find our detailed terms and conditions and privacy policy here:
- Terms & Conditions: https://www.aumio.com/en/rechtliches/impressum
- Privacy Policy: https://www.aumio.com/en/rechtliches/datenschutz
descriptionShort: White Noise & Sounds, Baby Tracker for Sleep, Leaps, Breastfeeding App by Aumio

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Ready for an adventure with Happy Baby? As part of this release, we start rolling out :

- a few important fixes to keep things running smoothly.

If you get stuck somewhere, please contact us at info@aumio.de. We look forward to your feedback.

All your log entries are saved forever, and our customized insights and diagrams help you understand what's best for your little one.

On top of that, you'll find plenty of sleep aids within our app. From soothing melodies and gentle nature sounds to rhythmic noise, we offer a variety of science-based sound experiences designed to help your baby relax and drift off to sleep. Personalize the sounds according to your baby's preferences to create a peaceful atmosphere for deeper, more restful nights.

In addition to helping your baby sleep better and supporting you in finding the right routine for your family, Happy Baby also offers an extensive knowledge articles on baby health and development. Is your baby going through a developmental leap or experiencing a sleep regression? Our timeline-based library will help you understand what your baby is going through and how you can best support them.

With our user-friendly interface and intuitive design, using the app is a breeze. Track your baby's sleep in real time, get personalized sleep plan recommendations, and find useful insights for raising a healthy and happy baby.

Give yourself and your baby the rest you both need and deserve. Download our app now and start improving your baby's sleep today for relaxed nights and happy days!

- CONTACT -

You have something you want to tell us? Or you need some help? Then we would be very happy if you sent us an e-mail to baby@aumio.de. We look forward to hearing from you!

P.S.: If you like using Happy Baby, please rate us here in the store.

- CONDITIONS -

In order for us to continuously operate and improve our space offerings, you can support us with a subscription. In addition to the free content, subscriptions give you access to exclusive premium content, extensive tracking functionality plus our loved DreamTimer which will always let you know about ideal nap times for your little one.

Subscriptions renew automatically unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period. Your iTunes account will be charged for the next subscription term within 24 hours before the current subscription expires. The current in-app subscription term cannot be canceled. However, you can disable the auto-renew feature at any time through iTunes account settings.

And last but not least, please find our detailed terms and conditions and privacy policy here:
- Terms & Conditions: https://www.aumio.com/en/rechtliches/impressum
- Privacy Policy: https://www.aumio.com/en/rechtliches/datenschutz
descriptionShort: White Noise & Sounds, Baby Tracker for Sleep, Leaps, Breastfeeding App by Aumio

title:

descriptionHtml:
Restless nights and mom-brain are a thing of the past!

Discover the Happy Baby app – designed to help your baby sleep better and support you in gaining confidence with your new routines.

Based on your baby's natural rhythm, our DreamTimer creates a daily nap and sleep schedule personalized to your baby's needs. You'll always know how to plan your day and when to put your little one down – before they get overtired. Say goodbye to irregular sleep routines and improve your baby's sleep for good.

Track everything from sleep, feeding, and diapers to solids and doctor visits. You can create your own custom routine and gain valuable insights into your baby's development and changing habits.
